Staff & Board of Directors - Diamond Head Theatre Skip to content Box Office: (808) 733-0274 | Business Office: (808) 733-0277 Facebook Instagram YouTube LinkedIn Email Search for: Shows & Tickets Buy Tickets Season Subscriptions Seat Map Show Archive Subscriber Login Donate Annual Giving Capital Campaign Producer‚Äôs Club Sponsorship ‚ÄòIlima Awards Auditions Show Auditions Shooting Stars Classes Year-Round Classes Summer Musical Theatre Experience Shooting Stars Instructors Scholarships About Staff & Board of Directors Instructors Volunteer Rentals News Show Archive Your New Theatre Theatrical Arts Building Make a Gift Sponsor a Seat Photos News Capital Campaign Donors Contact BUY TICKETS Staff & Board of Directors Jacque Vaughn 2025-07-23T06:29:51-10:00 STAFF & BOARD OF DIRECTORS We bring the magic of theatre to all Trevor Tamashiro, Executive Director Trevor joined Diamond Head Theatre as Executive Director in April 2023. Born and raised in Hawaii, and a graduate of Punahou School, he brings nearly 20 years of experience in nonprofit executive leadership. Trevor started his journey in New York City working for Broadway Dance Center. Other positions include: Chief Advancement Officer of The Diller-Quaile School of Music; Deputy Director of Saratoga International Theater Institute; and Deputy/Program Director for The Drama League of New York. Trevor is a member of the Association of Fundraising Professionals and is a Certified Fund Raising Executive (CFRE). He holds a degree in Theatre Arts from University of Miami, a Master of Business Administration degree from Pace University, and a Master of Science degree in Nonprofit Management from Columbia University. John Rampage, Artistic Director John Rampage is a performer, actor, choreographer, and director who has served as Diamond Head Theatre‚Äôs Artistic Director since 1995. He is the creative mastermind behind all of the theatre‚Äôs productions and programs, overseeing the curation of two or more shows each season and selects directors, musical directors, and set designers. His relationship with the theatre began in 1975 where he performed as Tommy Gilas in the 1975 production of Music Man. In the 1980s, Rampage danced and sang his way across the U.S. and Europe and returned in 1991 as choreographer of Evita. More than 120 productions have been shared with the community under his oversight. A 47-time Po‚Äòokela Award winner for excellence in the theatre, John is also the recipient of the Hawaii State Theatre Council 2006 Pierre Bowman Award. About Us - LaBelle HomeCare Skip to content Home About Us Services Testimonials Resources Blog Assess Your Needs Contact Us Now Hiring Menu Home About Us Services Testimonials Resources Blog Assess Your Needs Contact Us Now Hiring Assess Needs About Us About Us Home About Us Dedicated to compassionate care for your peace of mind. Who We Are Labelle Home Care is dedicated to delivering exceptional care services across various settings, including homes, hospitals, and nursing homes. Our mission is to support individuals in achieving the highest level of independence and quality of life, regardless of their environment. Our team of compassionate and skilled caregivers provides personalized care tailored to each client‚Äôs unique needs. Whether it‚Äôs assistance with daily living activities, medication management, or companionship, we strive to create a nurturing and supportive atmosphere that fosters well-being and peace of mind. At Labelle Home Care, we believe in the immense value of every individual we serve. Our comprehensive range of services ensures that clients receive the right level of support, whether they are at home, in a hospital, or residing in a nursing home. Our dedicated staff members are passionate about enriching the lives of our clients through attentive and professional care. By offering flexible and responsive care solutions, we aim to make a positive impact on the lives of those we serve, ensuring they feel valued, respected, and empowered. Our Purpose Statement Our mission is to serve you with care that is safe, affordable, and tailored to your needs. We aim to provide personalized support that empowers our clients to reach their highest level of independence. By focusing on each individual, we ensure that the care delivered is both compassionate and effective, helping you achieve the best possible outcomes. Our Mission  Statement LaBelle Home Care strives to provide a delightful personal experience when making the difficult decision to hire non-medical personal care in your home. Our core values are family oriented to provide the best and trusted care. We are a small, family owned business. We carefully hire and train caregivers that embody the family values that embody our core values. Our Passion Statement The passion of the LaBelle Team is to provide person-centered care that enables the family to worry less and enjoy the relationships that were meant to be. We understand that as a loved one needs assistance, it can put strains on the family relationships and cause logistical and scheduling issues for individuals. That's why we are here to provide reliable, person-centered care so that both you and your loved one can live your life with freedom and independence. Meet Our Team Rodney Larche Owner, CEO Rodney earned his MBA from the Robert Smith School of Business and his path led to a high pressure job in a supply chain. In 2019, he decided to leave that position to start LaBelle Home Care. Rodney Larche Owner, CEO Rodney earned his MBA from the Robert Smith School of Business and his path led to a high pressure job in a supply chain. In 2019, he decided to leave that position to start LaBelle Home Care. When Rodney and his wife, Mesode, moved from VA to PA they discovered their oldest son was autistic. They enrolled him in bright horizons day care which required him to have a full-time aide to attend. Rodney and Mesode decided to open a care company to support their son, but discovered after the fact that that they licensed the wrong type of home care. With Mesode's healthcare background and Rodney's problem solving abilities, they decided to give the business a shot because they discovered that the need for non-medical home care was extensive. Five years later, the business has grown to service many clients in their homes in and around the Philadelphia region. Phone: +1 (859) 254-6589 Email: info@example.com Linsey Cheshire Director of Marketing & Development Linsey has over 20 years of experience in the eldercare industry. She has worked in several senior living communities and has been part of the hands-on care team. Linsey has worked in activities and holds Linsey Cheshire Director of Marketing & Development Linsey has over 20 years of experience in the eldercare industry. She has worked in several senior living communities and has been part of the hands-on care team. Linsey has worked in activities and holds 
an ACE group fitness certificate which allows her to lead exercise and health and wellness programs with seniors. She has over seven years of experience in sales and marketing, helping to bring families together to make the best decision through education about aging, senior living and home care options. Linsey is also a certified yoga teacher. She enjoys teaching yoga, listening to music and cooking in her free time. Phone: +1 (859) 254-6589 Email: info@example.com Cristabel Young Business Office Director Earning her MBA from CASS in France, Cristabel has worked in customer service for her entire career. Specifically, she has worked in relationship management since 2010. Cristabel joined the management Cristabel Young Business Office Director Earning her MBA from CASS in France, Cristabel has worked in customer service for her entire career. Specifically, she has worked in relationship management since 2010. Cristabel joined the management  team of LaBelle in May of 2024 and has done a fantastic job coordinating care for our clients and managing relationships with our caregivers. Cristabel is originally from Ghana and studied in Europe. She moved to the U.S. in 2021. Cristabel is an adventurous person who enjoys the outdoors. She likes hiking, kayaking, cooking, and watching movies. Phone: +1 (859) 254-6589 Email: info@example.com Reach Out To Us Experience the exceptional care and support you deserve‚Äîcontact us today to schedule your personalized consultation and discover how we can enhance your well-being with our dedicated home care services. LaBelle Winery | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Join now Sign in LaBelle Winery Hospitality Amherst, New Hampshire 1,383 followers Offering an Unrivaled NH Winery Experience See jobs Follow View all 94 employees Report this company About us Plan your visit to one of our beautiful locations in Amherst or Derry, NH!

Experience our state-of-the-art, award-winning winery in Amherst and enjoy a fun, educational and relaxed visit.  Whether you join us for a wine tasting & tour, view our fine art gallery, shop in our Wine and Gift Shop or dine in our Bistro restaurant, we're sure you'll enjoy every moment of your time with us.  Sign up for an enrichment program such as yoga or wine and culinary classes (to name a few) that will enhance your visit.  LaBelle Amherst is home to an event center for hosting private corporate, social or non-profit events.

Plan a day at LaBelle Derry, our newest location. In addition to an event center and Americus Restaurant, our Derry property features a beautiful 9-hole par-3 golf course and miniature golf course. Stop by LaBelle Market for delicious coffee, homemade pastries, delicious food on-the-go, snacks and more; plus all of our wine and The Winemaker's Kitchen culinary line for shopping.

LaBelle Winery consistently receives the awarded distinction of Best New Hampshire Winery; Best Tasting Room; Best Local Winery and Vineyard; and Best Wine Selection, year after year by numerous independent polls.  TripAdvisor has awarded LaBelle Winery the Certificate of Excellence and Open Table's Diners' Choice Award for The Bistro.  All ages are welcome, as well as dogs on our outdoor spaces in Amherst and Derry (including outdoor dining).

Visit our website for the most current hours of operation in each location, as well as directions. Visit our website to learn more & inquire! https://lnkd.in/eAe985ie 1 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery reposted this Stephanie Fournier Experienced Hospitality & Non‚ÄëProfit Event Specialist| Open to New Hospitality Leadership Roles 1mo Report this post What an awesome day at LaBelle Winery SummerFest! 

A huge thank you to everyone who helped make it such a fun and memorable event. We had live music, lawn games, amazing local vendors, delicious food and drinks, and tons of activities for families.

I reached out and asked for support from some of my favorite businesses and groups in the New Hampshire community for this fun, free event‚Äîand wow, did you all come through. I‚Äôm so grateful!

Special shoutouts to:
 ü•Ñ Stonyfield for the yummy yogurt samples (kids and adults alike loved them!)
 üèÄ Dick‚Äôs House of Sport & üéØ YMCA of Greater Londonderry for keeping the fun going with awesome games 
 üöí Derry Fire Department for bringing the fire truck for a hit Touch-a-Truck experience
 üëã NH Granite State Ambassadors for being the perfect team to welcome our guests with warm smiles Kelly Bryer ‚öæÔ∏è New Hampshire Fisher Cats and the one-and-only Fungo for visiting and snapping pics with guests (I might be biased, but he‚Äôs the BEST mascot around!) Sydney Peterson, M.S. And to our incredible LaBelle team‚Äîyou truly went above and beyond. With this being our first-ever SummerFest, your hard work, energy, and teamwork made it all come together. So proud of what we accomplished! Especially our "SummerFest Captain", Danielle Mojonnier , you absolutely crushed it and made SummerFest unforgettable! 

Thanks to everyone who came out‚Äîwe loved celebrating with you and can‚Äôt wait to see you back again at LaBelle Winery soon! #LaBelleWinery #SummerFest #OneLaBelle #NewHampshireEvents #CommunitySupport 22 5 Comments Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 1mo Report this post The holidays will be here before you know it! üí´ Book your company party or gathering at LaBelle Winery before October 31st and receive complimentary holiday-themed centerpieces for your event. And if you're celebrating at our Derry location, you can add in a magical stroll through LaBelle Lights for your guests!

To learn more and book your outing, contact Stephanie Fournier at stephanie@experiencelabelle.com . We look forward to hosting you! 3 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 2mo Report this post We‚Äôre thrilled to share that LaBelle Winery has earned top honors in the 2025 New Hampshire Union Leader Readers‚Äô Choice Awards! 

A huge congratulations to our Executive Chef, Justin Bernatchez, who was named Best NH Chef for the second year in a row ‚Äî a well-deserved recognition of his leadership and culinary excellence at Americus, The Bistro, and our events.
We‚Äôre also honored to be voted:

Thank you to everyone who voted and continues to support what we do ‚Äî your recognition means the world to us!

Labellewhitehouse About Us: | Labelle White House top of page President. Daniel E.Santiago Jr Administration Since 2012-Present non-profit organization WELCOME About Us Offices of the President Administration Careers Center Press Room Public Schedule Photo's of LWH President Award LWH Sports Sustenance Department S.S.T Department N.I.S.C F.D.M.D Sponcers Sponcers Levels the Labelle White House About Us: The Labelle White House, Is a non-profit organization Corporation , that oversees many different departments (LLC). that was founded in 2012. by President Daniel E. Santiago Jr the Labelle White House 2025-2026 Our Departments President Daniel E. Santiago Jr Administration ‚Äã Labelle White House Administration At the Labelle White House Administration, we are dedicated to serving our community through transparency, collaboration, and compassion. Comprised of appointed members from various departmental secretaries‚Äîincluding the S.S.T. Department, LWH Sports Department, NISC Department, and F.D.M.D.‚Äîour administration is committed to addressing the needs of those we serve. Our Mission We are proud to operate under The Labelle White Non-Profit Organization, ensuring that every initiative we undertake is focused on making a positive impact in our community. Our funding comes from Independent LLC Departments, allowing us to sustain our efforts and expand our reach. Community Commitment We believe in giving back. That‚Äôs why we ensure that 100% of all donations received are reinvested into community programs designed to support individuals and families in need. From food assistance to sports programs, our initiatives aim to uplift and empower our community members. Get Involved Join us in making a difference! Whether you‚Äôre looking to donate, volunteer, or learn more about our programs, we invite you to explore our website and become part of our mission. Thank you for visiting the Labelle White House Administration. Together, we can create a brighter future for our community!
